docs.title: About the scholarship
docs.text: Physics Alumni Scholarship (formerly known as Hunarmand Scholarship program) is created with the sole purpose to provide financial assistance to the students that are currently enrolled in the Department of Physics, University of Karachi. The Scholarship is managed under the supervision of Mr. Waqar Ahmed (Lecturer). The scholarhip has been running since Fall 2021. Total funds has been raised for this scholarship is 1.42 Million PKR and have supported 89 students so far.
